"Hi, Nick," said Ness smiling, "we're having a sleepover for the weekend and we'll like you to come."

"Me?" you asked confused unsure why two of the most popular boys in school would want your company.

"Yeah, dude. What do you say? We have games to play and lots'a pizza to eat" replied the black haired boy.

"Hmmm... So good...." he mumbled enjoying your taste and your wrigling as he suckled you like a pacifier.
After a while you started to settle down, as the soft tongue and the warm air around you started to make you relax. It wasn't all that bad...
Outside of the damp cavern, Lucas sat down on the ground making himself comfortable. Not only did Nick taste good but his wrigling felt weird, a good type of weird.
111121.title: He licks you

choices: He rubs your crotch by accident
111122.content:
While Lucas kept sniffing your body enjoying your scent, you saw his face grow red and felt his heart beating faster.
"Lucas?" you ask unsure of what was going on in his head.
"Oh, sorry!" he stutters. "You just smell so good"
"Berries, I know." you reply trying to pry his hand open so you could move more freely.
"You also look really cute like that..." he murmurs half-hoping you would hear what he said.
"What?" you ask ,letting go of his pointer finger.
"I..." he starts blushing even more. "I think you look cute like that!"
You looked at him surprised. "Uh...Thanks, I guess..."
"Can I..." He says as he opens the fingers around your crotch exposing your stuff to the world.
You shout in shock and embarrassment as the blond kid peeked at your privates.
"Lucas, what are you doing?!"
"Sorry, sorry! I just... I just wanted to see it..." he responds closing his hand back covering your junk
"You can't just do that!" you shout at him, angry we would take advantage if you like that.
Lucas looked down ashamed. He didn't want to make you angry, he was just curious. At least that's what he thought.
You stopped shouting when Lucas spoke again.
"Please forgive me." he said with teary eyes "I won't do it again, I promise!"
You could tell he wasn't lying just by looking at his teal eyes. He seemed to genuinely like you. And you felt a little bad for being so harsh to him.
"It's ok. Just warn me before you do something like that again."
"You're not mad?" he asked
"Not anymore. You just caught me by surprise." you reply trying to shrug it off which became harder as Lucas pulled you towards his face, nuzzling you with his cheek.
"Thank you, thank you, thank you!" he says rubbing you softly on his warm cheeks.
111122.title: He is blushing

1111222.content:
As he rubs your body on his cheek, he accidentally rubs your privates giving you a erection.
You blush, noticing the feeling every boy your age knows all to well, and try to cover yourself but Lucas keeps pushing you against his left cheek keeping your hands away from your shame.
He pulls you away, feeling something wet on his skin. He brings his free hand to examine the liquid and you go pale as a ghost realizing you just smeared pre-cum all over his face.
"So you like this?" the boy says smiling at you. "You like it when I rub you..."
He opens up his hand making you fall on your buttocks with your legs apart. Lucas takes the chance and sticks his index right in you crotch slowly caressing your member.
"...like this?" he says the moment he finds the tip.
You try to push his finger away but you're too weak.
Lucas giggles looking at your tiny body flailing around.
"You're so cute tiny like that." he says.
"Stop it!" you protest "This is gay!"
He stops just as you were about to bust your load on his finger. Lucas eyes widen, you just gave him an idea.
1111222.title: He rubs your crotch by accident

11112221.content:
"Gay?" he says playfully. "So what?"
You look at him confused at his reaction but now you have his attention so maybe you could sort this out.
"It's wrong for two guys to do stuff like this together. We need to find Paula. Yeah that's it!"
You were hoping he would take you to Paula and she'll be able to help you but Lucas had other plans.
"So what you're saying is, if I was a girl then you'd be okay with having fun with me?"
"No, what I meant was..."
"You look like you were enjoying it." he says pointing at your, still throbbing, boner. "But if you want a girl then I'm sure we can do something about it"
You look at him puzzled. As a boy filled with hormones you liked the idea but you weren't into any of the girls you met today. Paula was a too serious and Tracy was too childish for your taste.
Lucas wraped his hand around you and tucked you inside one of his pockets. Inside you couldn't climb out but you could tell by the movement of his legs he was going up the stairs leading to the bedrooms.
Suddenly your cloth prison dropped to the ground with you in it. The fall was harf but the cloth of his pajama soften the landing for you. Now you could crawl outside and maybe get away from the crazy Lucas and get help from one of the other kids.
Peeking outside you were treated with a very generous view of a girl's panties, striped, white and pink with a red chekered skirt around them.
Your boner came back, full throttle as the mounds above you swayed sideways slowly.
The "girl" quickly turned around to face you with big blue eyes and blond hair.
"Now I'm a girl!" Lucas said picking you up from his pants. "Now it isn't gay."
"It's still gay" you try to argue "you're just dressing up."
"Well, you're little friend doesn't seem to mind." he replies poking your erection again.
You had no point to make. Whatever you could say, your dick contradicted. Maybe you were gay and your body was telling you that.
"Now that we got that out of the way, I think this time is your turn to make me feel good."
11112221.title: Traps aren't gay!

choices: It seems to work for now
12.content:
"... At my house" Lucas said quickly interrupting Ness.
"... Yeah... At Luca's house." Ness said looking at Lucas akwardly as the blonde boy blushed in embarrasment.
"My bro here here isn't very good at making friends, you see, so we're doing a sleepover to make him more confortable around other people and perharps have him make a few new friends." He continued putting his arm around Luca's neck, smiling confidently at you.
"It's just gonna be the two of us and Claus." explained Ness.
"And kumatora" added Lucas quietly.
"That's a bit small." you noted "Do I know those two?"
"Claus is this goof's twin, he's homeschooled so you probably don't know him and Kumatora is going to babysit us." Ness explained.
"So... I'm the only new guy?" you asked.
"We're gonna take it slow with him. Let him get used to new people."
Lucas nodded still unconfortable to be in this situation.
"So..." he started slowly as if he choosing the right words, "you want to come?"
You didn't really have much programmed for the weekend and personally you didn't have all that many friends yourself so you accepted.
Luca's eyes lit up and a smile grew on his face.
"Tha-thanks!" he said awkwardly getting a pat on the back from Ness "See you later!"

You waved them goodbye as you went back on your way home.
Your parents saw no problems with the sleepover knowing the kids wouldn't be by themselves and were glad you were making friends.

Packed and ready you said goodbye to your parents and went on your way to the end of town where Lucas lived.
Luca's house was a wooden cabin on top a small hill close to the river.
As you got closer to the house a brown dog began barking signaling your presence to his owners, it had short fur, dropped ears and an orange scarf around it's neck. The dog kept you at a few feet away from the house but even though he wasn't on a leash, he didn't attack you or walked towards you.
Lucas came through the door after hearing Boney bark.
"Hi Nikk" he said while petting the dog "Boney, this is Nikk. He's a friend so be nice, ok?"
The dog barked in agreedment, and went up to you nudging at your hand.
"He wants you to pet him. That means he trusts you now." Lucas explained.
You pet the dog on the head.
"Wow! You're really good with him." you said to Lucas suprised at the dog's obedience.
"Come in." Lucas invited, walking with you inside the house as Boney got back into his doghouse resuming his vigilant watch over his family's house.
Inside, the house was a single floor completly made of wood and with a single door leading into the room where Lucas and his family slept in two beds.
"Uh... Lucas? Why do you have a fireplace?" you asked noticing the brick structure with dark stains from usage.
"To warm uo the house during winter. Why else would you need a fireplace?" he asked not realizing what you meant.
"No. It's that, your house is made of wood. And you have a fireplace which burns wood to make fire." you explained
Lucas looked at the fireplace.
"Oh..." he said as he realized the situation. "We never had any problems with it, but it's really weird now that I think of it."
"What are you guys talking about?" said a voice from the room to the right.
It sounded just like Lucas but more less hesitant and more straight forward.
"Nikk's here" Lucas said to the voice.
A boy that looked just like Lucas stepped out through the door to the boy's room, next to each other the only thing telling them apart was their clothes and their hair.
"I'm Claus." he put out his hand asking for a handshake. "Nice to meet you."
Looked like there were more diferences under the surface.
"Nikk. So you're Lucas brother. How are the raindeers?" you smirked at your joke.
Claus shuckled.
"That's a new one!" he replied giving you a nudge on the shoulder.
As you and Claus talked about his adventures that led to his parents opting to homeschool him Lucas heard a knock on the door.
Feeling a bit left out, he went to the door without saying a word.
"Hey blondie, how is my favorite pair of socks?" said a pink haired girl wearing a blue hoodie and shorts when Lucas opened the door. Behind her was Ness playing with Boney, foundling the dogs ears with his hands as the dog tried to catch him with his mouth.
"Hi Kumatora!" he said giving her a hug.
Ness waved at him as Boney made him tumble to the ground licking his face happily.
"Who's a good boy?" Ness said playfully as the brown dog got off him. The dog gave a happy bark in response.
"Hey Lucas, guess what I brought!" Ness got up running up to the blond and the girl.
"What is it?" he asked excitedly.
Ness pulled out a pack of comics from his backpack.
"My dad, got me the whole collection!" he said proudly showing Lucas one of the comics still propelly packed in a clear plastic wrapping.
"Wow! Are you sure you want to open them here? They're brand new and all..." Lucas asked afraid the group could break or stain Nes's brand new magazines on accident.
"Hey, look at that!" said Kumatora looking at the volume Ness was holding "I remember buying this one when it came out."
"You like comics too?" asked Ness looking at the girl with big sparkly eyes.
"Hell yeah!" she said quickly regretting it "Oops, I'm not supposed to talk like that around youl, kids. Is your dad home?"
"No..." Lucas looked down with a sad expression "He went to visit mom's grave... But said it was too far for us to go with him."
"Oh. Lucas... Don't worry, we're going to have a blast while he's gone, okay?" Kumatora asked bringing his face back up with gleaming eyes.
"And don't forget who's here to turn that frown upside down!" said Ness taking his cap off to place on top of Luca's head.
"Hm-hm" he replied feeling a bit better knowing that his friends were there for him.
The group walked inside to find Claus and you sitting on the table talking more casually.
"You tried to fight a Drago?!" you exclimedimpressed by Claus.
"Yep, thankfully my dad was there to save my butt or God knows what could have happened to me" he said a bit ashamed of the ordinary conclusion to his tale.
"Kumatora and Ness are here." Said Lucas as he got in followed by the new guests.
"Who's the new face?", said Kumatora looking at you.
" I'm Nikk, with two k's." you introduced yourself.
"Two k's? That's original." she smirked
The group gathered around the table and Ness spilled the contents of his bakcpack on it getting a amazed gasp from you and Claus.
"So many comics!" you reply astounished.
"Captain USA. The Bulk. Steely man. Bullseye. The entire Revenger's cast." Claus said.
"It's a overarching story! Each volume follows each hero's perpsective along different missions with a conjoining end." Ness explained.
"You guys have all the luck. I had to wait a entire month between each chapter." said Kumatora picking one of the magazines.
As you and your new found group of friends dived into the colorful pages, following your favorite heroes on their adventures and sharing opinions and tit bits of hidden lore and rumours you heard about them, night came around. The conversation then moved to the adventures the gang had gone through themselves as Ness compared an alien villain from the comic books to someone called Giygas.
"Who's that?" you asked receiving confused looks from everyone.
"Wait! You don't know about Giygas? The starmen invasion? PK?" asked Kumatora looking at you concerned.
"Should I?" you asked as Ness facepalmed himself.
"Frick!" Ness had forgotten that after his fight in the past with Giygas time had been altered so there were no traces of his influence on the present.
"You seriously just talked about that around a normie?!" said Kumatora giving a stern look at Ness.
"What?" you asked being ignored.
"Sorry..." Ness drops his head embarrased.
"Well, that doesn't help anyone!" the girl replies more agitated. "You know normal people are still vulnerable to his influence. Just that name could affect him."
"Go easy on him Kuma" interruped Claus putting his hand your shoulder "If push comes to shove we can just purify Nikk with PK"
Now you were even more confused. Pk? Giygas? Invasion? Just who where these people?
"Fine" said Kumatora putting flinging her hands in the air in frustrastion "But you need to be more careful. You of all people know what that fucker is capable of!"
Lucas glared at the swear. His dad would be really mad if he knew Kuma would be speaking like that around them.
"Nikk, we need you to sit on the ground for a moment, okay?"
"Uhh... I don't know what is going on..."
"Don't worry, we'll explain everything later but for now you'll need to trust us on this." Claus said calmly
You felt unsure but your curiosity was nagging you. What's the worse that can happen?
You slowly nod with your head, still a bit unsure and get yourself on the carpet sitting in the middle.
The group got around you.
"Ok. Now. You might feel a bit lightheaded but it should be fine" Claus explained.
"Ok..." you reply a bit nervous.
The three boys and the older girl surrounding you put out their hands towards you and closed their eyes.
You felt something wash over you like a gust of hot air coming from each of your friends. Then a sudden lightness in your head like vertigo. Then it changed, you felt something grabbing you, a strong presence beside you grabbimg you by the waist.
"Guys!" you say slowly feeling the presence reaching upwards. "I-i feel something grabbing me!"
Looking at the others you saw they were struggling, panting heavily and sweating.
You tried to swat at the thing rolling around your torso but your hands got stuck midair.
"Help! It's grabbing my hands! I can't move!" you scream out.
Lucas was tried to help you, shouting "PK Flash!" and emitting a flash of blinding light towards you and the entity.
12.title: Luca's house (Lucas, ness, Claus and Kumatora)

info.brief_description: The cast of mother 2 and 3 indulge in various activities with tiny complications
info.description:
You are invited by Ness or Lucas to a sleepover at one of their houses where they want to show you "something cool". Depending on where you choose to have the sleepover different characters may join you and the boys on your "little" experiments with pk.
Everything is allowed except scat and death
Keep it to earthbound characters.
Giygas and other non humans can join in too
